nodes.text: The Republic Outpost was a Galactic Republic space station located at the Mid Rim planet Ord Mantell during the High Republic Era. It was staffed by Republic and Jedi Order personnel, and included a complement of Jedi Vector starfighters. Jedi Padawans Lula Talisola and Farzala Tarabal, along with the Force-sensitive Zeen Mrala, stayed at the Republic Outpost while attempting to track down the Nihil pirates who had Mrala's friend Krix Kamerat.
